name: Climate Warrior
description:
Project for GDD@TU Graz - Group 12

You are hired as a city planner to save a small river-side village from climate disasters. Accept quests from the residents to develop the village in a sustainable way and lower its carbon footprint. Explore the nearby forest for crafting and building materials, which you can use for constructing tools or fulfilling the villagers’ requests. Beware of the enemies you may find while exploring and solving the necessary puzzles to advance your missions and story.

Currently, this is only a prototype to showcase the main mechanics, which are: Inventory, Dialogue, Basic Movement, and Minigames. There is no real progression or gameplay yet. Saving/Loading the game state currently works only for the inventory on the "Current" build!

Controls:

MOVEMENT                     - WASD

INVENTORY                      - E

DIALOGUE                          - F

IG-MENU                              - ESC ("Current" build only)

ADVANCE DIALOGUE - SPACE

JUMP/DROP TILE           - SPACE (Minigames)
